## i2cReadDevice() function

This reads count bytes from the raw device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function i2cReadDevice(handle: number, rxBuf: Uint8Array): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handle | number | The I2C device handle as returned by [i2cOpen()](./lgpio.i2copen.md) |
|  rxBuf | Uint8Array | The buffer to receive the data read from the device |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The number of bytes read from the device
